data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Meksuwan, Phuripong, Pholpunthin, Pornsilp, Segers, Hendrik (2013): The Collothecidae (Rotifera, Collothecacea) of Thailand, with the description of a new species and an illustrated key to the Southeast Asian fauna. ZooKeys 315: 1-16, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.315.5330, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.315.5330
